duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the daily operations of the Table Games department to ensure compliance with gaming regulations and company policies.
Coordinate, direct, and assist table games shift managers in evaluating casino games personnel and setting policies for the integrity of table games activity.
Create and understand financial reports and present them to the executive team, while also being responsible for monitoring monthly profit and loss statements.
Responsible for table inventory, ordering equipment and supplies, and determining new table games to introduce to the casino floor.
Supervise staff relationships with customers and fellow team members, monitor customer play for unusual activity, and ensure safety and security of employees and customers.
Carry out managerial responsibilities including interviewing, hiring, training employees, addressing complaints, and performing currency transaction reporting.
Attend operational/strategy meetings with senior management when scheduled and ensure compliance with Nevada Gaming Regulations and company policies.
Maintain knowledge of applicable company and departmental policies and procedures, and comply with all regulations and standards.

Maintain open communication with management, maintain a positive and professional demeanor during all interactions with guests, employees, and vendors, and accept performance feedback in a professional manner.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or Equivalent Work Experience, Two+ years as a Table Game Department Manager or five+ years as a Table Game Shift Manager and two years as a department manager.
